ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The project was financially supported by the Polish National Science Centre research grant OPUS 15 No. 2018/29/B/NZ7/01873. This project was carried out with the use of CePT infrastructure financed by the European Regional Development Fund within the Operational Programme “Innovative economy” for 2007–2013. We would like to cordially thank prof. Grażyna Nowicka, dr hab. Joanna Stefańska and Mr Marcin Bąder (all Medical University of Warsaw) for their support by providing the infrastructure needed for most of the experiments.
